md:
giải nghĩa từ "mma" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

mma /ˈɛm.əˈɛɪ/ ( abbreviation )

* Meaning: Mixed Martial Arts ( môn võ thuật hỗn hợp )
* Part of speech: noun
* Example sentence: "He's a professional fighter in the MMA league."
* Related words: martial arts, boxing, wrestling, karate.

Note: MMA is a full-contact combat sport that combines elements of various martial arts and combat sports.

mma ( abbreviation )

* Meaning: Medical Marijuana Association ( hiệp hội cần sa y tế )
* Part of speech: noun
* Example sentence: "The MMA is advocating for the legalization of medical marijuana."
* Related words: medical marijuana, cannabis, legalization.

Note: This meaning is specific to the context of medical marijuana advocacy.

mma ( abbreviation )

* Meaning: Metropolitan Museum of Art ( bảo tàng mỹ thuật thành phố )
* Part of speech: noun
* Example sentence: "The MMA is one of the largest and most famous art museums in the world."
* Related words: museum, art, New York City.

Note: This meaning is specific to the context of the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City.
